alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 08 at 12:52AM CST until January 08 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following counties, Goliad and Victoria. * WHEN...Until 245 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1252 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Ball Airport Area, Victoria Mall, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Downtown Victoria, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Victoria Regional Airport, Nursery, Telferner, Salem, Mission Valley, Wood Hi, Oak Village, Schroeder and Fordtran. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
